title: Innovalab
text:
TACTIC-PERU


As part of the TACTIC-PERU initiative, we aim to develop a digital tool for open access living research on the attribution of climate change impacts on health.











AIM 1


Collect and synthesise existing evidence, data and methods on health impact attribution








AIM 2


Perform novel analyses to address complex methodological questions, using a set of case studies








AIM 3


Design user-friendly open access digital resources in a co-production process with relevant stakeholders






:::
